biography_text: MEUSER, Dan, a Representative from Pennsylvania; born on February 10, 1964; attended New York Maritime University (now SUNY Maritime College), Bronx, N.Y.; graduated from Cornell University, Ithaca, N.Y., 1988; entrepreneur; business executive; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Eleventh Congress in 2008; Pennsylvania state secretary of revenue, 2011-2015; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
